DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-center registry study. The investigators will include 10,000 patients with confirmed acute ischemic stroke in China. The aim of the study is to survey current treatment situation in China and compare the effectiveness and safety between different intervention regimens.
DOC.brief_title: Chinese Acute Ischemic Stroke Treatment Outcome Registry
DOC.detailed_description: Stroke is a common disease in China. Compared to western countries, there are many treatment regimens used in clinical practice in China. But their treatment effects are not well validated. The aim of the study is to survey current treatment situation in China and compare the effectiveness and safety between different intervention regimens.
